website_summaries.verdict: A fun and adjustable costume that will be the hit of the party, although very small dogs may have trouble keeping the cowboy in the saddle.
pros: Made from breathable, soft, and safe materials
Available for small, medium, or large dogs
Wears well, and has adjustable Velcro straps
cons: The cowboy is too large for small dogs, and tends to flop to the side
Some think the stitching is poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When not in use the cowboy walks around your house talking trash and spitting on your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious! Good quality and fits great
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume. I got a large and it fits my 60 pound lab/pit mix very well. Seems like good quality and even a hard shake from my doggo couldn't make it come loose. Adjustable straps make it a perfect fit. The cowboy's face and body are really cute and it rocks back and forth as he runs. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Designed but so Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's not a great design, especially for small dogs because the cowboy is so large he just topples to the side. They seem to have attempted to prevent this with a strap on one side but only one side so he just flops to the other side. Given that it's still really cute and it has three straps so it stays on well even if it is a bit lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily TempletonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description. Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My dog's measurements are 10" neck and 16.5" chest. She is a 15 lb Shih Tzu. Well within the measurements you have listed for "small" {current amazon measurements listed for this item are S:neck length:7.1"-13.8"; chest length:10.2"-17.3" M:neck length: 11"-20.5"; chest length: 13.8"-24.8" L:neck length 19.7"-25.6";chest length: 25.6"-29.5"} and yet, what was sent was not even close to fitting. Way too small. especially in the chest. Pictures attached
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake factory

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2-year-old Pug, let's just say it was totally worth it haha! I was worried about the size tho, I ended up getting her a Medium and it's almost a little too big. but it still fits her good enough. overall I'd recommend it. The Quality is good as well, well made and the "cowboy" is well stuffed The stitching is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarajane Waack

customer_reviews.title: Very cute costume!
customer_reviews.text: Got a medium and it fits my 25lb pug well enough. It’s a big tight around his little barrel chest but it works well in not falling off him. I showed everyone a video of him wearing it and they all cracked up!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer número one

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog costume
customer_reviews.text: This gets us and those around us laughing as my puppy runs around with the cowboy on her back. This is her first costume and it doesn't seem to bother her. The halter strapping is comfortable and somewhat adjustable. The only downfall is the cowboy tends to lean to one side or the other and I have to adjust the costume often. Overall, it's still a fun costume.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: My cat thinks I suck, but YEEHAW! 🤠
customer_reviews.text: I went with the medium sized one instead of the small, because Spunkle is a chonky boy, around 20lbs. The small may have worked better tho. I pinned the cowboy hand so he would sit up a lil more straight. It took him some getting used to but now he’s neutral about the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Portia St Germain

customer_reviews.title: the cowboy is funny and on top of your pooch
customer_reviews.text: The idea is very cute... the cowboy is funny and on top of your pooch!? ADORABLE. Unfortunately, the cowboy hardly stays on top no matter how tight or loose I make the velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: Ain's approved
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to set up, stays on, and turns heads
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Howdy cute
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start by saying it is very cute and funny to see the cowboy on your dog. I had a good laugh. I would buy again. The straps were a bit loose so the little cowboy would go to the side. I did try to tighten it a bit with a pin which helped. For the price I believe it’s worth it. It gets a laugh out of everyone and if your dog is a chewier like mine he’ll end up having a toy at the end of the day if you’d like
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews, this is awesome though! My only note is that the large barely fits on my 65 pound lab, a couple more inches and she would not be able to wear it. The cowboy does lean to the right side but it just makes the look better, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on my boy don’t you agree?
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, the doll stayed up. I’ve read in the reviews that it leaned to the side. I put it on my boy for a couple minutes just to make sure it stayed and fit him correctly. I was a little hesitant about the large but it fit perfect on him. He weighs 62lbs last time I checked but he’s large. It fit and the doll stayed up, even after he had a shake. So I’m excited to use it for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Hayhay

customer_reviews.title: very funny!!
customer_reviews.text: we got this for our 5 month old Boerboel and its hilarious. he hasn't gotten to the cowboy doll yet but the doll itself is not cheaply make so we're hoping this last for next years costume too.
customer_reviews.author: darizo99

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is either cheaply made or I received a defective one. The small is SUPER small and would not even fit my 10lb thin cat! Also, the seams are showing and loose! Regret this purchace!
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: I order a size larger based on reviews stating it runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11 lb Pomeranian and ordered the Medium because I read reviews that it ran small. I should've ordered the Small but I can still make it work so I didn't take any stars away since it was my error and there is nothing wrong with the costume and it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decide which costume I wanted for my puppy but when I saw this one I knew it was the one! We got a huge kick out of this one! The one pictured here was a large and it fit great! My fur baby, Bullet, was impressed with it himself :)
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for hours
customer_reviews.text: This was the highlight of our Thanksgiving Day crowd... everyone laughed and found it super entertaining. My dog is use to having sweaters and jerseys on for events...so this didn’t bother him- I will say,that he could easily use it as a squeak toy,if I’m not careful to keep it out of reach!
customer_reviews.author: D+J

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Hiya, I got two size mediums for my 13-19lb poms.. I just love these. This is the second time I am trying to send a positive 5 star review. They blocked my first one... I do not know why.. family friendly reviewing Grandma here :) so I will keep it short to see if it goes.. but very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it. Find one in person.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is way off. But that's not all: The man's legs were sewn down pointing straight out, not straddling the saddle like in the photos. C'mon... really?
customer_reviews.author: Quality Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large for my 50-lb German Shepherd and I had to put it on the smallest settings possible. I then ordered a medium to see if that fit and I couldn't get it on her. Super cute and soft, definitely a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome costume
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this costume. It came packaged in a nice resusable bag. It’s easy to put on and it’s lighter than it looks. I took the advise of previous reviews and purchased a medium for a small dog. I found that it was big on him so I had to make alterations. However my dog is a puppy and he’s very sleek and thin. I would still recommend getting a size bigger than your doggie. The costume is very easily altered if it need to be sinched or loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good but just misses the mark.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea for my Shih Tzu mix... BUT, the cowboy wouldn’t stay upright to save my life. It was a little disappointing because I was the only one who got to see the costume based off its original intent. The cowboy kept going limp, and the entire idea of the costume went unnoticed. It was very soft, but I would suggest having an idea for keeping the cowboy standing straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 49lb husky. I bought this in a large because I thought it would run small but A large was bigger than I expected, could be that my dog is just lean. Cowboy came in a bag and the costume Velcros around the body. Product is adorable. 10/10 😍
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit and endless laughs
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this costume! The quality was fantastic and I had no problem with the cowboy sitting up. My 8 month old Lab is 68 pounds and the Large fit great with plenty of room left on the Velcro portion. He ran and rolled around for a solid 45 mins with it on and it stayed put and still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sasko

customer_reviews.title: Large is still a little small
customer_reviews.text: We have a coon/great dane mix, she is about 65ish pounds and this little costume just barely fits her. I bought the large. I think I'll add a button to the strap across her chest, the velcro just doesn't hold on if she is running. The cowboy held on as long as he could! It sure gets a lot of laughs though!!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Halloween Hilarity
customer_reviews.text: This costume is so funny - it cracks us up to see our dog run with this on. The Velcro sticks to the soft fabric instead of the other piece of Velcro and therefor doesn’t stay on perfectly, but nothing a safety pin can’t fix. We bought a large for our 63 lb wirehaired vizsla.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: but it is very cool: )
customer_reviews.text: It was too large for my dog, but it is very cool :)
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: The small is incredibly small small enough to fit a rabbit. Everything else that I buy for my dog I buy a small. This is like an extra extra small. And also very poor quality don’t buy it waste of your money
customer_reviews.author: Etienne baber

customer_reviews.title: Super funny! The weight of the Cowboys kind of heavy though. Had to make some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Let's suppose a fun item. Cowboy was bigger than I expected. A little heavy. We had just sew it so that It could go tighter on our dog . Since the weight would make the cowboy fall down. It was super funny though
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but like other reviews said the same thing the cowboy doesn’t stay up straight falls to one side but overall we love it
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume however mine was sewn a little weirdly and kept sliding to the same side. It needs something to keep it upright. Adorable for the first minute when she was running, it looks just like a bull rider waving his arm and hat!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Funny costume but works more in theory. The rider was laying down on my puppy's back most of the time. Plus he pulled it off before long. Cute and easy to put on but maybe not for a puppy or hyper dog.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: He won the costume contest
customer_reviews.text: So great!!! We loved this on our male Chihuahua! He won the costume contest 🤣 fit was perfect, stayed on without shuffling. Do your measurements! If u do, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_a_holic👍

customer_reviews.title: weird size but good buy
customer_reviews.text: it is hilarious and made everyone smile :) I don’t know if I had gotten a medium it would’ve fit better on my 32 pound Corgi. From the neck it fits perfect but the chest and tummy part was too loose that I had to use the straps to tie it. It arrived quick and great product besides the weird sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: It’s a party
customer_reviews.text: Had to deduct one star as he doesn’t sit upright very well. But love it otherwise. It does run big as well. Sizing up would be wise.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Funny costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Halloween costume for my pup. And she won the Funniest Costume at a charity fund raiser down at the local brewery!! The cowboy does tend to fall to the side on her a lot but really funny when she runs.
customer_reviews.author: Peppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Most attractive costume!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this costume, my puppy participated in the Pittsburgh Corgi Gathering 2020 and won second place in the costume contest! A big thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: What a shame...
customer_reviews.text: So diappointed. I measured my pup and bought the appropriate size. Should’ve had about 5 inches of give on my dog per the sizing chart but when received I couldn’t even fasten on her. Size chart is not accurate at all. Quickly returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for my frenchie. It fit okay but the cowboy doll on top doesn't sit upright and flops to one side. Also the hot-glued cowboy hat didn't stay attached, fell off in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Van Summer

customer_reviews.title: It's just kind of weird honestly
customer_reviews.text: It's funny. I guess. The guy is making a really weird/unhappy face, like he's having a difficult bowel movement or something, which is... weird... or funny... I guess you get to pick. My huskies run A LOT (as per the breed!) and we thought this would be fun. In reality it just kind of hangs sideways and they try to bite it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is hillarious
customer_reviews.text: It does tend to lean to one side and it's somewhat cheap but it will last unless you let the dog chew on it. My dog doesn't really mind wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dubbean

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This little cowboy is so cute! It fit Virgil perfectly! The hat needs stitching down so it won’t turn out, but otherwise, it worked good.
customer_reviews.author: TOX

customer_reviews.title: Sizing sucks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small for my dog. Didn't fit. Too small. So I ordered another one which was a medium and that one was too big. I gave up and just gave it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousJustBecause

customer_reviews.title: The Cowboy Lies Down on the Job
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible dog costume. The cowboy lies down and ruins the entire idea.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA MURPHEY

customer_reviews.title: Off sizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute product, but the measurements didn't line up for my dog. I measured with a tape measure was suggested in the sizing suggestions, so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M

customer_reviews.title: Best costume by far!
customer_reviews.text: We were doing a cowboy dinner and of course that means I have to dress up my dog. This costume couldn’t have been more perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog costume
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog costume! (even though my dog doesn't). My dog is 40 pounds, and the large barely fits her. The cowboy hat was just glued on with what looked like hot glue, so it immediately came off. I refastened it with a safety pin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny dog and it was too small. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: fay goodman

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I loved the costume. The medium size was perfect for my dachshund/ poodle mix. He weighs 25 lbs. He thought I was putting a new vest on. He was a hit at the Barktoberfest at the dog park. Dog Halloween costume test and parade. he didn't win the costume contrst though. Very funny when he runs with it on!
customer_reviews.author: Acn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Be great if it fit my dog. Sizing is off and is nowhere near being able to even be fastened to my dog. Not worth dealing with returning so modifying it to fit on his walking vest.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Wow we received so many compliments on this for a pooch parade. People could not help but stop and ask to take photos of our dog wearing this. BONUS, it did not bother him like a sweater or other costume would. We loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I though this would be a simple costume for my dog. But the sizing isn’t quite right. In fact if you have a big dog, then just forget it. If you try to stretch it out it will just rip. Also. The rider doesn’t stay up right and falls to one side. Definitely needs some more thinking put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Quick buy

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hank loves wearing this... it fits perfectly and it’s super comfy for him! It’s hilarious seeing him run around in it, we were all in tears the first time he wore it!!! Soooo funny!!! Great quality. Hank is a little overweight at 19lbs and I bought a medium, I didn’t have to adjust anything!!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really stinkin cute, but might run a little big. We ordered a small then returned it for an XS.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is the best! It stayed on and was hysterical when our dog ran in it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah B

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: So fun. Put it on my goat. Facebook friends loved it.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: My dog was still a little young for this so we're holding off to use this next year so we will have to figure out a way to get it to stand up better but so far we haven't figured out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, but we had trouble keeping the cowboy up. He always seemed to fall back and lay down. My dog was still a little young for this so we're holding off to use this next year so we will have to figure out a way to get it to stand up better but so far we haven't figured out how to make it stay upright entirely. Otherwise, it's very funny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot of fun! Soft and comfortable for the dog
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dog’s Halloween costume. The fit wasn’t exact, but he didn’t seem to notice. He loved it and kept trying to get to the cowboy. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: NinaTwoSix

customer_reviews.title: So funny
customer_reviews.text: It’s not like an all day outfit, but very hilarious for short periods of time. Mine was a little big I have 13 lb shuhtzuh average weight wish I would sized down. Very adjustable though
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Ummm no
customer_reviews.text: This was super cute, but it does not stay on properly. The guy kept leaning one way. Didn't end up using it for Halloween
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Dog costume
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute in and my dogs just love it. Can’t wait to buy another outfit for them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nix

customer_reviews.title: The costume SUCKED!
customer_reviews.text: The rider had a frightening face. I didn’t like the way the rider hung off of the body of the costume.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTA LITTKY

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy falls off the horse!!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but way too big, cowboy also falls to the side slot!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sporcic

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Size med my Frenchie is about 28 lbs worked great. Wish my dog moved around more fore the action.
customer_reviews.author: bumble

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy won't sit up straight.
customer_reviews.text: It's a real cool costume, but it's real hard to get the cowboy to sit up straight.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets so excited when I get her dressed up. Fits nicely with the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: So darn cute. Dog is not bothered by this on its back. A laugh a minute.
customer_reviews.author: St Judith

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all dog breeds
customer_reviews.text: Yes its cute but this costume only fits L-O-N-G dogs. My dog has a broad chest and tiny waist so it did not fit right and the cowboy was on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiana A. Follett

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large, but a big hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price point was great and it definitely got a laugh and lots of attention everywhere my dog wore it. The sizing was a little off (larger than expected) which made the cowboy lean to the side, but I just pinned it tighter and pinned the cowboy to sit upright. Worked great! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious to watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought just for laughs, I love it! Easy to fit collar and leash on too
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: cowboy keeps slinging to the side
customer_reviews.text: it's cute but the cowboy keeps slinging to the side. decided not to use it for halloween. plus I didnt return it because my dog likes to chew on it lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazonreviewer7777

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was a huge hit. So funny to watch the dog run around.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy up!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome costume for my Border Terrier! She actually seemed like she enjoyed carrying the little cowboy around!
customer_reviews.author: Dust Queen

customer_reviews.title: Only for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This looked so cute on the Corgi dog pictured on the site but did not work for my larger dog. It fit him but looked stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, well made, and durable. I am very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Very good as a saw it in the advertising is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good as a saw it in the advertising is perfect for my dog. Thank you, came on time thak you, but they left my package tha basket where is tha mailbox thank God i went to check if i have mail to where a live has access to the street, so plassee throw it,as always in the patio thank you
customer_reviews.author: Hada m. batres

customer_reviews.title: Size too big, my fault.
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely crazy about it but it’s too big for our dog. I should have ordered a small. She is a Westie so collard and harnesses are mediums. Am going to order a small and return the medium. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Navara

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure my pup feels the same but I think it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Grannygypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this costume and it went together perfectly with my outfit as Sadie Adler from Red dead redemption 2. The material is super soft as well! My only complaint is that it was a bit larger than I had expected it to be but it didn’t effect it at all as it stayed on the whole night of us trick or treating.
customer_reviews.author: Hailie

customer_reviews.title: TOO cute!
customer_reviews.text: This will my pups Halloween costume this year. Looks funny when the cowboy bobs around while my dog runs!
customer_reviews.author: Gram Belle

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15 lb Havanese. He doesn’t love wearing clothes/accessories, but when he was running around the house it was so funny. We took him for a walk outside (note, there’s no hole where a leash would hook on) and our neighbors loved it. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary wolff

customer_reviews.title: So funny
customer_reviews.text: Surprised me how much cowboy stays upright. so funny and dog doesn't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: greg b.

customer_reviews.title: A real hoot!
customer_reviews.text: A real laugh watching the dogs run around with the cowboy on a bronc ride!
customer_reviews.author: nathan strom

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! She is a boxer/bulldog mix and the Large fit perfectly with a bit of adjusting. Great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Hilight44

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 60 lbs Olde English Bulldog. It fit him pretty well and was the hit of the party.
customer_reviews.author: Team Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Let the hilarity ensue!
customer_reviews.text: This should come standard with every Corgi. We actually had to take it off of her so we could stop laughing. The likelyhood of purchasing another type of this sort of costume is VERY high.
customer_reviews.author: HM Fritz

customer_reviews.title: best $20 spent
customer_reviews.text: best $20 spent! it's hilarious when you call to your dog and he comes bounding in with this cowboy ....
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Cute Costume
customer_reviews.text: Even though I tried the medium which was to big and, the small was too small. Seller refunded both and let me keep the small. Great customer service. Such a cute costume well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. It's super cute and well-made. But possibly get the size up from what it says. I had to jerry-rig mine
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was precious. Fit good. Was fun to see the costume on my little dog
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute cowboy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The costume was a hit at the dog park, but it sits kind of lopsided and probably won't last more than a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Violet

customer_reviews.title: So cute and good price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute , I just need to pin the cowboy a bit but fits my lab perfect
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Never used it because it was way too small for ...
customer_reviews.text: Never used it because it was way too small for my medium dog! Cute item but strap around belly to attach it won’t go around dog....and my dog is skinny!
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy costume!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting and looks so cute on my puppy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume but the large was a little on the tight side for my great Dane.There were no XLso I may have to modify it a little bit but it'll get us through this Halloween. 😀
customer_reviews.author: maria s.

customer_reviews.title: its so funny
customer_reviews.text: i hate walking the dog so i figured this would help.... it does lol sizing it does run a little big, i got him a small (11-12 pound wiener dog mix) and the guy starts to lean after a few blocks
customer_reviews.author: michael phillips

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: So adorable on my cocker spaniel! Fit ok. I had to fasten it snugly to keep cowboy in place and it did rip a little. But just look! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: DebF

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: It was a super cute costume, I just wish that the cowboy would sit more upright so it looked like he was actually riding on my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Macias

product_meta.title: NACOCO Cowboy Rider Dog Costume for Dogs Clothes Knight Style with Doll and Hat for Halloween Day Pet Costume
feature_bullets: CUTE COWBOY DOLL:"Look"! A funny knight with a rein in his hand who rides on the dog is coming to us.When you walk your dog in the street, it will catch lots of people's attention
CONVENIENT AND ADJUSTABLE: Design of saddle shaped clothes, it is easier to wear for your dog.And HOOK&LOOP can be adjusted in accordance with pet size,which ensures dog more cosy and snug
SUPERIOR MATERIAL: Made of breathable,soft and skin-friendly cotton and polyester fiber,they make the dog feel comfortable all the day
USED WIDELY: Suitable for Pug,Maltese,Jack Russell Terrier,French Bulldog,Boston Terrier Teddy,Corgi and so on.As a gift for Halloween, Christmas and Birthdays

X-Small: Chest girth: 8.0-13.5 inches; Neck girth: 5.0-9.5 inches. Small: Chest girth: 13.0-20.0 inches; Neck girth: 6.0-17.0 inches. Medium: Chest girth: 20.0-26.5 inches; Neck girth: 12.0-18.5 inches. Large: Chest girth:29.0-33.5 inches; Neck girth: 19.0-25.5 inches.
